Très bon jeu d'horreur voir même excellent!
le gameplay en tant que tueur ou survivant est facile à prendre en main. J'aime beaucoup la diversité chez les tueurs.
Les graphismes sont plutot bons. pas besoins de depenser de l'argent dans le jeu pour gagner.
Malgré les "campeurs" ou bien les survivants "toxique", ce jeu est génial et encore plus entre amis!
si vous et vos potes cherchez un jeu de team et que vous voulez avoir des frissons et du rire, n'hésitez plus, achetez le!

Dead By Daylight e um jogo muito bom para quem vai jogar junto com seus amigos ou até mesmo sozinho...

Sobre o game ele tem 2 pontos positivos e negativos. 

Positivo: O game quando vc pega pela primeira vez vc fica com um pouco de medo mas umas 4 jogadas já acaba.
               O jogo tem personagens com habilidades unicas que pode salvar sua vida em varios momentos ou a vida do seus companheiros. 
               O jogo tem varios momento divertidos que vc pode acabar rindo, levando susto, ficando com raiva ou ate mesmo zoando com o pessoal.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Negativo:   O jogo possuí sempre o mesmo objetivo, liga os geradores e abrir a porta e sair. 
                   Quando vc vai jogar sozinho pode ocorrer um error na fila, Seu game vai ficar procurando sala infinitamente.
                    (Isso sempre ocorrer comigo mas e só sair do jogo e entrar novamente)
                    Ou pode ocorrer um problema no carregamento da partida aonde vc fica preso no loading.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recomendação pessoal:

Quando vc for compra este jogo eu recomendo espera uma promoção e compra junto com seus amigos. 


Pra quem vai jogar sozinho:

Eu recomendo este jogo para quem vai jogar sozinho ou entre amigos. Você pode começar a jogar com assassino e depois de sobrevivente. 


Resumo:

Jogo vale apena compra mas e recomendo espera uma promoção da steam para obtê lo.

Ιnnovative concept - Worth money spent - Stressfull gameplay 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

So i had this game on my whishlist from the first moment. I knew that the concept was different from the most horror games out there. I was busy playing other games before i realise that i must give it a try. I must say that i have read many mixed reviews about how awesome, edgy and "fun to play" this game is and at the same time how "cancerous" and salty are the players or how bad and "cheaty" are the ingame mechanics.

Here is my pick:
-----------------
(1) The concept is innovative indeed - NO DOUPT.
(2) No matter if u choose killer or survivor, you will play in a constant stressfull and edgy enviroment, trying to find ur victims before they escape or trying to escape yourself.
(3)The progression is pretty smooth. It doesnt require you to play tones of hours but from the other hand it's not too easy . Even the ranking of this game is pretty neat. As long u "win" and take enough bloodpoints, u earn a higher rank too.
(4) "Winning" is about perspective. You dont have to kill all the survivors (if u are a killer) or repair all the generators (if u are a survivor). What matters is the procedure doing so (hunting survivors, laying traps, activating abillities or perks, hook survivors, repair gens, heal teamates, help teamates, distract killer, open gates  etc etc). Ofc its a lot of fun if u do so.

(5) The game has some bugs (some of them are fixed).
(6) The ability of the game to handle crashes or loading is problematic some times.
(7) Its not easy at all to hack at this game, unless u have some pretty basic understanding of specific tools and code, so there are no many hackers and even u face someone (f.e. a speedhacker), u can report him. There are a bunch of kids out there who ask at the forums "how i can hack how i can do this and that" thinking that hacking is like x-raying in minecraft or using cheat engine to increase ur money in Age of Empires. Its not the case here!!!
(8) Some killer builds(instant hathet - mori etc) or ingame mechanics-maps (f.e a map where there is a huge area full of pallets) are indeed overpowered and they need some balancing. However both killers and survivors have specific advantages and disadvantages according to the enviroment, the combination of perks etc.
(9) Both killers and survivors need skill to play , and u must surely take a step back and learn some tricks if u want to be a good player.

Conclusion:
-------------
Although the matchmaking is good enough to create a game with players of the same (more or less) rank, sometimes if u face an overpowered killer or a team of well cordinated survivors , ur game can be pretty annoying but a lot of fun too.
But exept from that, this game definately worth its money and the time u spent to play it.
I believe that people who sometimes sound overhelmed at other reviews or forums are because either they have played many hours on this game and subconsciously they got bored or they try to compare the game with a well structured rank-skill-like game like Overwatch or League of Legends. Dont expect to reach rank 1 (highest rank) and face "grandmasters" or "challenger" players on the other side.

Each game has its own cycle. Dont expect every game to be "another epic multiplayer game who will last over the years" (aka World of Warcraft). Instead , try to appreciate the unique parts this game has to offer. I think that's the case here!

我玩了这个游戏400多小时，讲述开始之后一个地图一个鬼和四人之间斗争，作为逃生者来说就是鬼抓你跑，跑掉修机，但是作为杀手来说就不一样了，每个鬼有都有自己的能力，以及强化自己能力的道具。当然作为逃生者来说，也不会坐以待毙，你也制定许多方案来对付杀手，至少我不会，我很会隐藏就是了。

A lot of time has passed since the game was released, so I'm writing a new review.

For a start I must say the devs did a pretty good job so far. (and I mean it hahaha)
There's much less bugs now and they are constantly working on bringing a better experience and stability to the players. The game is even more balanced, the new Rift, perks and items are awesome, and the rework of freddy is nice. 

It's still a lot of fun playing this game, and it's even better with friends. 

I hope the devs keep up the good work!!!

Es un juego totalmente desbalanceado. Se tarda un montón en comprar personajes del juego con puntos y está hecho así para sacarte más dinero. Comunidad tóxica por parte de los supervivientes y de los asesinos (tuneleos,campeos,puteos,trolleos de los compañeros etc.) que te quitan totalmente de la inmersión en la partida.Un sistema de puntuación desastroso y bugs . Cuando empecé a jugar pasaba nervios  porque podía meterme en el papel pero después de 408 horas te das cuenta de que los desarrolladores no les importa que pase con el juego siempre que puedan ganar más y más dinero con él. Ahora hablemos de los bugs, si en todos los juegos puede haberlos pero muchos bugs absurdos siguen estando en el juego incluso desde hace 1 año y ni los arreglaron. Me decepciona mucho decir esto pero no merece la pena pagar por esto .

Ein gutes Spiel, bei dem ständig Neuerungen hinzukommen. Das Gameplay ist ziemlich einzigartig, beinhaltet jedoch auch einige Fehler. Am Anfang kann das Spiel etwas frustrieren und nach ca. 10 Spielstunden steigert man sich mehr hinein. Für Leute, denen das Setting gefällt, ein Dauerbrenner!

I've played this game for about 300 hours. I have mixed feelings about this game but at the end of the day I still recommend it. If this game will have any future that insists on having more responsible and adept developers who will make changes without breaking basic things of the game. (on 1.9.2 chase music bugs, item not retrievable from chest etc.). Like seriously I cant see a way these things could be bugged. Plus every change they are making should be based on a pro player's prespective and not on someone's who is just watching it getting played or just being noob-mediocre in their gameplay.

 As a survivor main myself I feel really overwhelmed when the killer camps the hook and moris me after a teamate has farmed me. There's just not an option for someone being camped. I mean your team can be doing gens till your sacrafise duration runs out but speaking individually you get nothing more than a death result.
